articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Secretary General of African Regional Committee for Study of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from Andre Lohekele Kalonda, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, on March 18 on behalf of the participants in the African regional on-line seminar on the Juche idea.
					 The letter recalled that adherents to the Juche idea in the African region held an on-line seminar on the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The world progressive people unanimously recognize that the present reality of socialist Korea was brought about thanks to the Juche idea founded by the President and the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants in the seminar, too, appreciate that prosperous socialist Korea is the most precious patriotic heritage handed down by the great leaders.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the father of socialist Korea and great leader and Kim Jong Il was the great theoretician, statesman and patriot.
					
					 One of the greatest victories and successes achieved in the DPRK is that the issue of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche was solved most perfectly as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The letter extended encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle for greeting the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor feats and wished them successes.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Interviewed by TASS Foreign News Editor
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Interviewed by TASS Foreign News Editor
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong gave the following answers to the questions put by the foreign news editor of TASS Tuesday as regards the DPRK's stand to cope with the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula:
					 The U.S. extremely hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK have been the root cause of escalating tensions on the peninsula and compelling the latter to bolster up its nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. has posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK since long before the latter's access to nuclear weapons and adopted it as its policy to mount a preemptive nuclear attack and staged ceaseless nuclear war drills to put it into practice.
					
					 It attempted to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK already in the past Korean war. Since the 1950s, it has threatened and blackmailed the DPRK by shipping huge nuclear weapons into south Korea. 
					
					 The Bush administration listed the DPRK as "part of the axis of evil" and target of its preemptive nuclear attack. This policy remains unchanged till now.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the Obama administration excluded the DPRK from the list of the countries for non-use of nuclear weapons in April, 2010 and declared a preemptive attack on the DPRK while staging joint military drills with huge nuclear strike means involved in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is now staging nuclear attack drills against the DPRK by amassing all its strategic nuclear strike means in south Korea and in its vicinity. No country in the world has been exposed to such serious and potential nuclear threat as what Pyongyang is now experiencing. 
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to counter the U.S. nuclear weapons in kind.
					
					 As the U.S. has worked hard to stifle the DPRK with nuclear weapons, the latter was compelled to have access to nukes to protect the sovereignty and vital right of the nation to cope with it.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal who pushed the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons. The decades-long U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail have prompted the DPRK to do so.
					
					 The only way to cope with the constant nuclear threat and war provocations of the U.S., the world's only user of nuclear weapons and biggest nuclear weapons state, is to achieve the equilibrium of strength by bolstering up nuclear armed force.
					
					 The DPRK has tremendous military muscle capable of fighting any type of war desired by the U.S.
					
					 It opened to public real miniaturized and light nuclear warheads to be mounted on ballistic rockets and showed the capability of the atmospheric re-entry of inter-continental ballistic rocket.
					
					 The DPRK will further strengthen the state defence capacity with the nuclear force as its pivot to cope with the reckless hostile moves of the U.S. and its undisguised nuclear threat.
					
					 In the future, the development speed of the DPRK's nuclear force will depend on how the U.S. will behave and how its viewpoint on the former will change.
					
					 The U.S. is now busy with madcap largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers targeting the DPRK across south Korea despite its repeated warnings.
					
					 The war rehearsals in which hundreds of thousands of armed forces and various nuclear strategic means are involved are now under way under the simulated conditions involving nuclear preemptive attack on the DPRK and "beheading operation" aiming at a the supreme headquarters and "regime change," in particular.
					
					 The U.S. unhesitatingly declared that the joint military drills were aimed to finally examine the feasibility of a war of aggression against the north, thus completely discarding the deceptive and shameless cloak of "annual and defensive ones" though they have been billed outwardly so far.
					
					 The situation of the Korean peninsula is driven to the brink of war as the U.S. is making a preemptive attack an established fact while staging actual maneuvers under the simulated conditions of all kinds of surprise attack against the DPRK.
					
					 It has become quite obvious that the DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the imminent U.S. threat of aggression.
					
					 The DPRK has shifted all the military counteraction modes to preemptive attack ones to cope with the U.S. nuclear war hysteria and declared the will to mount a decisive preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 In a word, the Korean peninsula is standing at the crossroads of a thermonuclear war and peace.
					
					 The extremely tense situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula is something unprecedented and the whole world including your country is closely watching it with great concern and uneasiness.
					
					 In order to prevent the vicious cycle of ever-escalating tension on the peninsula, defuse the danger of war and ensure peace and security, one should not just watch phenomena in sight but properly judge their root cause and take measures for rooting out them, to begin with.
					
					 All the countries desirous of peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region should watch with vigilance the moves of the U.S. regarding the DPRK as its primary target of attack after shifting the strategic pivot for world domination to the Asia-Pacific region and make due efforts to prevent them.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Mohammad Nawaz Sharif, prime minister of Pakistan, in connection with a terrorist attack in Lahore, Pakistan that caused heavy casualties.
					 Expressing deep sympathy and consolation to the victims and bereaved families, the message reiterated the DPRK government's stand of opposing terrorism in all forms. It also hoped that the government and people of Pakistan would remove the aftermath of the tragedy as early as possible and restore the stability.

articles.title: General Meeting of DPRK Olympic Committee-Juche 105 (2016) Held
articles.content:
General Meeting of DPRK Olympic Committee-Juche 105 (2016) Held
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- There took place the general meeting of the DPRK Olympic Committee-Juche 105 (2016) on Tuesday.
					 Present at the meeting were members of the Olympic Committee and officials of the sports field and relevant units.
					
					 The general meeting reviewed the work of the committee in Juche 104 (2015) and discussed on the orientation of the work in Juche 105 (2016).
					
					 Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports and chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided the Seventh National Conference of Sportspeople last year and sent the participants a letter, the important guidelines for stepping up the building of a sporting powerhouse.
					
					 They said that sportspersons of the DPRK displayed the honor of the motherland in various international games, instilling the revolutionary enthusiasm into all the service personnel and people and making great contributions to glorifying the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as a grand festival of victors.
					
					 The general meeting discussed the matters of implementing the tasks set forth in the letter of Kim Jong Un and bringing about a revolutionary turn in the sports of the country this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK led by Deputy Ri Jong Hyok, president of the National Reunification Institute, came back home on Tuesday after taking part in the 134th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union held in Zambia.

articles.title: Poster Celebrating Seventh Congress of WPK Issued
articles.content:
Poster Celebrating Seventh Congress of WPK Issued
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A poster was issued in celebration of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 It is depicting the building of the WPK Central Committee and the party's flag. Written on the poster are letters "Seventh Congress of WPK" and "Celebration".
					
					 Pictured there is a bouquet of congratulations reflecting the unanimous mind of all the service personnel and people presenting to the glorious WPK.

articles.title: Satanic Hordes Can Never Escape Severe Punishment: Catholic Association
articles.content:
Satanic Hordes Can Never Escape Severe Punishment: Catholic Association
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Now all the Catholics in the DPRK bitterly condemn the Park Geun Hye group for unhesitatingly conducting vicious provocations as satanic hordes. They are burning their hearts with the will to deal the most deadly sledge hammer to the Park group.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Catholic Association of Korea said this in a statement on Tuesday.
					
					 The DPRK is the paradise of mankind where everyone lives in harmony with nothing to desire more under the leadership of the peerlessly great man, supreme incarnation of love and trust and protector of justice and peace, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Park group of villains worse than worms recklessly runs amuck to hurt the savior of the nation looked up to by all Koreans. This is the high treason and the worst evil that deserves the severest punishment.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK who value the dignity of the dignity of its supreme leadership more than their own lives have turned out in the sacred battle to devotedly protect the leader. We Catholics, too, have bravely turned out in the sacred just struggle
					
					 It is high time the Korean Catholics mercilessly punished the satanic hordes as they fear nothing for justice and truth.
					
					 We will throw the Park group of villains into the cauldron of hell without fail as they bring disasters to the country and nation, doing everything evil.
					
					 All Catholic organizations and believers in south Korea and overseas should actively turn out in the just battle to wipe out the traitors to the last man for the sacred dignity of the nation and its rosy future and eternal love, peace and justice on this land.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Huichon
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Huichon
Huichon, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave performance tour in Jagang Province with splendor.
					 The artistes of the troupe performed in Huichon City on Tuesday.
					
					 Among the audience were workers in the field of machine industry and officials and other people in the province and the city.
					
					 The performance began with the playing of "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as songs, dances and instrumental music.
					
					 In the numbers such as female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity" the performers impressively represented the noble thought and feelings of the army and people of the DPRK to add shine to the dignity and glory of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster" and other numbers instilled the fever to make a revolution and fight the audience who performed the shining feats in the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign. 
					
					 Dances revved up the atmosphere.
					
					 The performance ended with epilogue "We'll Travel One Road Forever", greatly inspired workers and other people in the city.

articles.title: Working People's Organizations Tour Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
Working People's Organizations Tour Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site
Anju, March 29 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea toured the Madusan Revolutionary Battle Site on Tuesday.
					 The battle site reflects the indomitable fighting spirit and revolutionary faith of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and the Korean people who ushered in the new era of the national liberation struggle in colonies, holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 The visitors cherished the indomitable revolutionary spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.

articles.title: Scientific Research Prizes Awarded to Excellent University Students
articles.content:
Scientific Research Prizes Awarded to Excellent University Students
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- University student scientific research prizes were awarded to students who distinguished themselves in study and scientific researches in the DPRK.
					 The certificates and medals went to more than a thousand students with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Korean Women Will Turn Out to Devotedly Defend Leader: Women's Union
articles.content:
Korean Women Will Turn Out to Devotedly Defend Leader: Women's Union
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- All the women of the DPRK will fully demonstrate the heroic spirit and stamina of the Korean women in the final battle for wiping out the U.S. imperialist aggressors and Park Geun Hye, traitor to the nation kowtowing to them, that have imposed all kinds of misfortune and sufferings on the Korean nation century after century and are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the inviolable 3 000-ri land,. 
					 A spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea said this in a statement Tuesday.
					
					 Saying that hearts of all the women in the DPRK are burning with towering indignation and strong resolution to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group which dared do harm to the supreme headquarters of the Korean revolution, the statement went on:
					
					 All the women in the DPRK are waiting for only the order for a final battle for reunifying the country to liberate the southern half of Korea. They are ready to join the service personnel and other people in the battle by carrying forward the noble spirit of devotedly safeguarding the leader displayed by women guerillas who devotedly defended the headquarters of the revolution with arms during the hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle and by those women soldiers who became human bombs and bullets to protect the safety of the Supreme Command during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 All the women in south Korea should never tolerate the reckless frenzy of the Park Geun Hye group to make innocent south Koreans fall victim to a nuclear war.
					
					 If they do not want their off-springs to be hurled into a nuclear war and if they want a peaceful and happy life of themselves and their families, they should start the action for punishing nuclear war maniacs.

articles.title: Pyongyang Undergoes Complete Change
articles.content:
Pyongyang Undergoes Complete Change
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is changing its appearance in the spring season.
					 Some 160,000 trees of 20-odd species were planted in wooded areas and flower stands set up in streets by district floriculture stations to cultivate various kinds of flowers adding beauty to the city.
					
					 And a work goes on to accelerate the growth of turfs already planted in streets, parks and pleasure grounds.
					
					 Meanwhile a project was lunched under a detailed plan to spruce up the parks and pleasure grounds, paint apartments and public buildings with coating materials of various colors, repair sidewalks and improve river conditions.

articles.title: New-term Chairman of IMGC Elected
articles.content:
New-term Chairman of IMGC Elected
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), was elected to be chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee (IMGC) at its 8th general meeting.
					 He had been active as the deputy secretary general of the IMGC from 2000 to 2003 and was elected president of the ITF in August last year.
					
					 The general meeting elected former Chairman of IMGC Jang Ung to be its honorary chairman.
					
					 The IMGC, whose final goal is to promote the solidarity and cooperation among persons of martial arts throughout the world and defend the global peace, was founded in Argentina on September 2, 1999, on the initiative of Choe Hong Hui, ex-president of the ITF.
					
					The Committee consists of ITF, World Muay Thai Federation, World Karate Confederation, World Jiu-Jitsu Confederation, World Judo Federation, International Jendo Federation, World Pangration Athlima Federation, World Union of TOA Association and the International Tai Chi Chuan  Association.
					
					 In the period from 2004 to 2015 there were six rounds of the International Martial Arts Games in Pyongyang, Bangkok, Tallinn, Melbourne and New Delhi.
					
					 The IMGC's head office is in Pyongyang.

articles.title: New Antiviral Agent Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Antiviral Agent Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A new kind of antiviral agent was developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This agent, based on Koryo (traditional) medicinal materials, prevents acute respiratory viral epidemic and stops virus replication, repressing its proliferation when infected with the disease.
					
					 So, it is applicable to the treatment of flu and other viral epidemics. The medicine has little side effect and its efficiency is over 90 percent.
					
					 The newly developed antiviral agent is lower in cost and higher in effect than other kinds of agents, including widely-used flu remedies.
					
					 This medicine is now under production at several pharmaceutical factories of the country.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Reckless Moves for Militarism
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Reckless Moves for Militarism
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe is persistently pursuing Japan's militarism and reinvasion.
					 This is evidenced by his undisguised utterances utterly disregarding and strongly criticizing the "bill on repeal of the security legislation" jointly introduced by opposition parties recently and his threatening remarks that in case its repeal is allowed, it would greatly hurt the Japan-U.S. alliance.
					
					 This is an extremely reckless act of a war servant working with bloodshot eyes to realize Japan's wild ambition for militarization and reinvasion, going against the trend of the times.
					
					 Voices critical of the "security legislation" have grown stronger before and after its adoption for its gravity.
					
					 Not only some Asian countries but the West are expressing uneasiness and concern over Japan's emergence as a country capable of fighting a war again and strong rebuff is being voiced within Japan, too.
					
					 Rallies and demos have been staged in different parts of Japan and broad social and media circles as well as the ruling Liberal Democratic Party are calling for the abrogation of the legislation. A "lawsuit meeting" was set up to file a suit with local courts across Japan against unconstitutional legislation. Opposition parties' demand for the abolition of the legislation reflects the people's wishes to live in peace free from a war.
					
					 Despite such unanimous rebuff and denunciation of the public inside and outside Japan, Abe strongly chided the anti-war forces, asserting the justice of the "legislation" under the pretext of "tightened Japan-U.S. alliance". This clearly indicates what phase his wild ambition for militarism and hegemony has reached.
					
					 By origin, the "legislation" is a product of despicable collusion between the U.S. and Japan. The former is keen to carry out its strategy for dominating Asia and the rest of the world, using Japan as a shock force, and the latter is working hard to implement its scenario to invade other countries with the backing of the former.
					
					 Militarist Japan is mulling creating politico-military and legal conditions for launching overseas aggression any moment without any legal hurdles, pursuant to the U.S. scenario for dominating the world, and, on this basis, kicking off operation for reinvasion.
					
					 This is why the Japanese authorities are vociferating about full performance of the function of Japan-U.S. alliance, increase of deterrence and firmer guarantee for Japan's security by the force of the "security legislation".
					
					 Japan has built up its military muscle for overseas aggression under the patronage of the U.S. for the past several decades since its defeat. The "Self-Defense Forces", the second largest aggression forces after the U.S. forces in the West, are set to conduct military operations everywhere in the world and be deployed overseas any time under the pretext of assisting the U.S. troops, pursuant to the war law. 
					
					 Japan has not yet shaken off the ill-fame as an enemy state after committing hideous crimes against humanity and war crimes though seven decades have passed since its defeat. Yet it is enforcing the "security legislation" while talking abut "Japan's security" and "its contribution to global peace and stability" with the backing of the U.S., chieftain of aggression. Its advocacy of such law is the height of impudence.
					
					 The "legislation" is an inevitable product of the extremely conservative politics of the present chief executive who regards militarism as his political idea and philosophy.
					
					 Japan's moves for aggression threatening peace and security of mankind are an unpardonable war crime as it brought unspeakable misfortune and pain to the Korean and other Asian people in the past.
					
					 War and peace can never go together. With no rhetoric can the Japanese authorities justify their militarism and war policy.
					
					 Japan's justification of the "legislation" is undoubtedly an extremely dangerous act of jeopardizing global peace and security as well as the destiny of Japan.
					
					 The present Japanese chief executive had better behave prudently, well aware that Japan's reckless militarization and overseas aggression would bring destruction to it in the end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Kunja-ri Spirit Dating Back to 1950s
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Kunja-ri Spirit Dating Back to 1950s
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The ongoing general march is a sacred struggle in which the tradition of victory is given steady continuity after being created during the long journey of anti-Japanese bloody struggle and in the flames of the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now the U.S. imperialists and their allies, frightened by the Mallima spirit of Songun Korea, are making desperate efforts to bring down the DPRK. The present situation requires all the party members and other working people to live and work in the Kunja-ri spirit created in the 1950s like the scientists and technicians of defence industry and workers in the field of munitions industry.
					
					 The Kunja-ri revolutionary spirit created in the 1950s is the inheritance of the Yanji bomb spirit created in the forest of Mt. Paektu and the eternal mental wealth of Songun Korea. The core of the Kunja-ri spirit is to defend the leader, the motherland and the revolution and it is associated with self-reliance and fortitude. The Kunja-ri spirit left a distinguished mark on the history of the Korean revolution which performed heroic feats in the arduous annals. The Korean People's Army wrought the military miracle of winning the war victory on July 27, humbling the pride of the arrogant U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and the DPRK demonstrated the indomitable spirit for building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence on this land. All this would be unthinkable without the Kunja-ri spirit.
					
					 The basic idea of our revolution can never change though the revolution has made a long stride forward and generations have been replaced by new ones and it is necessary to steadfastly carry forward the indomitable revolutionary spirit until the day of the final victory.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to proudly greet the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with the diary of the 70-day campaign recorded with the heroic struggle and brilliant feats  in the same spirit and with the same work style as the workers of Kunja-ri displayed, establishing the precious tradition of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Exploits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Ideological and Theoretical Exploits
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was the greatest man who performed immortal exploits on behalf of the times and the revolution through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 No one can match his profound ideology and theory associated with originality, features of era, simplicity and popularity.
					
					 His ideological and theoretical activities after the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, in particular, served as a fundamental source of strength of the party and people to bravely overcome difficulties facing the Korean revolution by dint of ideology.
					
					 He authored works systematizing and comprehensively dealing with the principles of the Juche idea which have displayed great attraction and vitality in the practice of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 In many works he made a perfect clarification of the theoretical and practical issues arising in party building and activities including its revolutionary character.
					
					 He also indicated the principled issues arising in training the Korean People's Army to be a matchless revolutionary army, strengthening the people's power and successfully carrying out socialist construction.
					
					 On the basis of comprehensive analysis of the historic limitation of the preceding socialist theories, he scientifically proved the fact that Korean-style socialism displays its vitality by fully meeting the intrinsic requirements of human beings and the Juche idea is the only ideological foundation of socialism.
					
					 He clarified the essence of the cause of immortalizing the leader, the first of its kind in the history of the revolutionary idea of the working class, its historical necessity and basic demands for carrying it out.
					
					 He explained the idea of the driving force of the revolution, the essence of the Songun politics and its position and the tasks and ways for implementing it.
					
					 His works serve as precious guidelines of struggle and life to be held fast to by the DPRK forever and eternal treasure of the Korean revolution to shine for all ages along with the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Preemptive Nuclear Strike Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Preemptive Nuclear Strike Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- AP reported that north Korea's declaration that a nuclear warhead explosion test and a test-fire of several types of ballistic rockets capable of carrying nuclear warheads will be conducted in a short time sounds plausible and Washington should cautiously approach the former's nuclear development capability.
					 A newspaper of Japan said that the U.S. should not interpret as a simple threat a successful simulated test of atmospheric re-entry of a ballistic rocket opened to the public by north Korea on March 15.
					
					 Foreign media including UK and Canada reported that north Korea's declaration on the miniaturized nuclear warheads and the access to atmospheric re-entry of a ballistic rocket was by no means hypocrisy but truth. Therefore, it goes to clearly prove that Washington's estimation was wrong as it ignored the nuclear development capability of north Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Western media's assertion is little short of a slap in the face of the U.S. intelligence institutions which have underestimated the DPRK's military capability.
					
					 The U.S. escalating nuclear threat and blackmail, sanctions and pressure only redouble the DPRK's muscle.
					
					 The DPRK had access to the world's greatest nuclear deterrent not to ignite a nuclear war. It is aimed to prevent the constant danger of a nuclear war prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK remain unchanged in their iron will to decisively retaliate against the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces as long as they are making desperate efforts to plunge the space of existence of the DPRK into a nuclear disaster by igniting hysteric war. Preemptive nuclear strike is by no means a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The Obama administration would be well advised to come to its senses, though belatedly.

articles.title: "Nuclear Security" Touted by U.S. Is One for Its Monopoly of Nuclear Weapons: Minju Joson
articles.content:
"Nuclear Security" Touted by U.S. Is One for Its Monopoly of Nuclear Weapons: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Indian newspaper Hindustan Times asserted that the U.S. initiated the "nuclear security summit" in a bid to make nuclear weapons the monopoly of some countries, not to completely eliminate them.
					 A similar tone of an argument was found in an article of the chairman of the "International movement for just world" posted on the website of the Institute for Globalization of Canada.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says that the U.S.  hypocritical nature does not go down with anyone any longer.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 When Obama talked about the "nuclear disarmament" and "denuclearized world" while initiating the "nuclear security summit" after coming to power, there were not a few countries which harbored a certain expectation.
					
					 However, such expectation was little short of a daydream.
					
					 The slogan "denuclearized world" put up by the U.S. was no more than a fig-leaf for covering its criminal moves for beefing up its nuclear force.
					
					 In the final analysis, the "nuclear security" being touted by the U.S. is, in essence, the one for its monopoly of nuclear weapons.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the coming "nuclear security summit" to be hosted by the U.S. would be also a sinister confab between the U.S. and its followers to cement their monopoly of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. hypocritical nature can not work on the bright present world as it is engrossed in all sorts of high-handed and arbitrary practices while getting frantic with the moves to develop new type nuclear weapons, wielding nuclear saber under the signboard of the "world without nuclear weapons."

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills under Fire
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The world will witness the miserable doom of the invaders and provokers running wild to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il stressed this in a statement on March 22.
					
					 The statement denounced the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime for making a last-ditch attempt to plunge the Korean peninsula into a nuclear disaster by kicking off the largest-ever joint military exercises. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have got fully ready for a preemptive attack to cope with the moves of the U.S. and its followers to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. has gone so foolish as to dream that its despicable special operation may work on the DPRK.
					
					 We strongly condemn the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' moves for a war of aggression and extend firm support to the just cause of the Korean people to defend the country's sovereignty and peace and security on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean People Call for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean People Call for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Joint Action for 2016 General Election and the Headquarters of All-out People's Action in south Korea sponsored a meeting in Seoul on March 26 to denounce the unpopular rule of the puppet authorities and their anti-reunification acts, according to the south Korean online paper Thongil News.
					 The speakers accused the Park Geun Hye regime of deteriorating the people's living, breaking her election commitment.
					
					 Tyranny against democracy, people's livelihood, peace and reunification has been perpetrated for the past three years of her office, they deplored, adding:
					
					 Though the situation on the Korean peninsula is becoming extremely tense but the "government" is taking such confrontation step as the shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					 The first victims of the fascistized power are the workers, peasants and poor, they noted, calling for making this year a year punishing the Park regime.
					
					 The participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Organization Urges Puppet Foreign Minister to Step down
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Organization Urges Puppet Foreign Minister to Step down
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean University Students Measure Committee to Denounce South Korea-Japan Negotiations held a meeting outside the puppet Foreign Ministry on March 26 demanding the nullification of the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and resignation of the foreign minister. 
					 The speakers declared the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army null and void as it covered up Japan's past crimes related to sexual slavery.
					
					 Owing to the Foreign Ministry which fabricated the humiliating "agreement", the Japanese government deleted the contents on the crimes to sexual slavery in the history textbooks and is going to teach students the distorted history, they charged. 
					
					 They urged Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se step down for this.

articles.title: S. Korean People Protest against War Maneuvers, Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korean People Protest against War Maneuvers, Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other organizations in south Korea staged demos and conducted information activities in Seoul, Inchon and Kunsan of North Jolla Province and Kwangyang of South Jolla Province on March 26 and 27 as part of the action against the U.S. imperialists' and the puppet forces' war maneuvers against the north and their arms buildup for aggression.
					 The participants charged that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills are assuming the nature of aggression as they are aimed to carry out the ambition for "removing the headquarters of the north" and "bringing down its social system" with huge nuclear strategic strike means.
					
					 The U.S. is going to deploy new weapons for aggression in south Korea, not content with reeking off the powder smell for invading the north, they said, underscoring the need to know well about the danger.
					
					 They called upon citizens to turn out in the action opposing the warmongers' moves.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Bird flu spread at a duck farm in Richon City of Kyonggi Province in south Korea on March 26, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It was reported that ducks were buried as the results of examination of virus detected at the farm confirmed it is avian influenza virus.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Stage Action for Peace against War
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Stage Action for Peace against War
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and Koreans in the U.S. staged a demonstration in Washington on March 25 demanding a stop to the nuclear war drills targeting the north, the conclusion of a peace treaty and probe into the truth about the warship Cheonan sinking incident. 
					 Calling for reunifying the country with the concerted efforts of the Korean nation, the participants underlined the need to withdraw the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces from south Korea at an early date and conclude a peace treaty.
					
					 They said that they would struggle together with the organizations for peace against war in the U.S. until peace is realized on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They issued a statement demanding a probe into the truth behind the Cheonan warship sinking incident.
					
					 Many honest-minded scholars and media persons clarified that the story about the warship Cheonan sinking by the "north's deed" was cooked up, but the traitors have escalated the tension, resorting to the war racket under the pretext of the incident, the statement noted.

articles.title: Bulgarian Political Figure Condemns U.S. Imperialists' Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Bulgarian Political Figure Condemns U.S. Imperialists' Anti-DPRK Moves
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, on March 21 released a statement critical of the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 Bringing to light the U.S. purpose of the ideological and cultural poisoning targeting other countries, he said:
					
					 This is ineffective in socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has been nervous about its failed scenarios of conquering the DPRK in the Korean war (1950-1953) and undermining it in the late 20th century. Consequently, the U.S. persists in the anti-DPRK campaign to attain its goal at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. should remember its shameful defeat in the Korean war which it provoked, boating of the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 The DPRK has remarkably grown up.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers should clearly understand this and act with discretion.

articles.title: Indian Body Slams U.S. Military Acts against DPRK
articles.content:
Indian Body Slams U.S. Military Acts against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The All-India Anti-Imperialist Forum made public a statement on March 14 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers.
					 The statement said:
					
					 After the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes, the U.S. and its followers are imposing harsher sanctions on it.
					
					 They are threatening the military attack on it.
					
					 The DPRK has never mounted a military attack on other countries and built military bases there.
					
					 It is just the U.S. and its followers that are committing a lot of despicable crimes.
					
					 The U.S. is the only country which used nuclear weapons in the world.
					
					 The world peace-loving people are bitterly condemning the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces for trying to topple Korea's socialist system.
					
					 The DPRK, a sovereign state, has the right to develop the means for defending itself from the imperialist invasion.
					
					 The All India Anti-Imperialist Forum together with the world progressives extends solidarity to the Korean people's just struggle.

articles.title: African Regional On-line Seminar on Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
African Regional On-line Seminar on Juche Idea Held
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- An African regional on-line seminar on the Juche idea was held from March 14 to 18 to mark the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the host-site in Kinshasa, DR Congo were photos dealing with exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Works of Kim Jong Un were also on show.
					
					 Present there were representatives of political parties, organizations, Juche idea study organizations including the Popular Revolutionary Party of DR Congo, the Communist Party of DR Congo, the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, the DR Congolese Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in DR Congo and figures of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in a report praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly great men who worked miracles of history in the struggle for liberating, defending and safeguarding the country under the uplifted banner of independence and Songun, and built and developed the socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Today's eye-opening reality of the DPRK would be unthinkable apart from their exploits.
					
					 Figures from Guinea, Uganda, Nigeria, South Africa and Ethiopia praised exploits of the great leaders and said that their idea and exploits are shedding their rays thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Malian Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Malian Party
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali posted an article titled "Brilliant name Kim Il Sung" on its website on March 21 to mark his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 The article noted:
					
					 April 15th is the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and founder of socialist Korea.
					
					 His name means the sun in Korean.
					
					 His name is shining as the symbol for national liberation and era of independence.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and Songun idea to indicate the way for mankind after he embarked on the struggle in his teens to liberate Korea from the Japanese imperialist military rule.
					
					 He fought a hard anti-Japanese war to liberate his country and built a country for the people. He set a world example in the struggle to realize the cause of the popular masses for independence by leading to victories the Fatherland Liberation War, post-war rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction.
					
					 He rendered sincere support to the people of many countries in their struggle for national liberation and building of a new society.
					
					 His august name is shining as the symbol of noble virtues and lofty sense of obligation.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked by Guinean Body
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked by Guinean Body
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) issued a special bulletin on March 24.
					 The bulletin carried articles subtitled "Muddy road he walked on his birthday" and "Song he sang with joy" under the headline "Happy day for President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The articles said the President found his pleasure in the work for the people all his life, dedicated his all to the people and created an epic of loving the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked by Russian Party
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked by Russian Party
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia on March 22.
					 Chairwoman of the party Sazhi Umalatova was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Peru
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Lima on March 23.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange diverse political and cultural events such as a national meeting and seminar in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de secretario general de Comite Regional Africano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de secretario general de Comite Regional Africano
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le dirigiera el dia 18 el secretario general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Andre Lohekele Kalonda, en representacion de los participantes en el seminario regional africano via Internet para el estudio de la idea Juche. 
					La carta senala que con motivo de los dias de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los adeptos a la idea Juche de la region africana celebraron el seminario via Internet para el estudio de la idea Juche. 
					
					Los pueblos progresistas del mundo reconocen unanimemente que la realidad de la Corea socialista de hoy es el fruto de la idea Juche, concebida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, y de la politica de Songun, practicada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, afirma y agrega que los participantes en el presente foro tambien estiman que la Corea socialista en prosperidad de hoy es el patrimonio patriotico mas precioso legado por esos grandes Lideres antecesores. 
					
					Alaba a Kim Il Sung como fundador y gran lider de la Corea socialista y a Kim Jong Il como gran teorico, politico y patriota. 
					
					Uno de las victorias y exitos mas notables alcanzados en la RPDC es que se ha resuelto mas perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, gracias a tener al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el supremo puesto del Estado, puntualiza.
					
					La carta envia el estimulo a la lucha del pueblo coreano y desea exitos en sus esfuerzos por acoger el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con los logros laborales sin precedentes.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong da respuesta a jefe de redaccion de TASS
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong da respuesta a jefe de redaccion de TASS
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta del director de redaccion de la agencia noticiera rusa TASS formulada en relacion con la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea frente a la situacion actual dada en la Peninsula Coreana el canciller coreano Ri Su Yong respondio el dia 29 como lo siguiente: 
					La extremada politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC son origenes del empeoramiento de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana y del fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo anterior a la posesion de las armas nucleares de la RPDC, Estados Unidos le dio a ella la incesante amenaza nuclear, fijo como su politica el ataque preventivo nuclear y ha venido desarrollando sin cesar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear destinados a ponerlo en practica.
					
					Ya, durante el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. planteo el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC y desde la decada de 1950 le dio a esta la amenaza y el chantaje nucleares introduciendo la enorme cantidad de armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea.
					
					La Administracion de Bush definio a la RPDC como "eje de mal" y objeto de ataque preventivo nuclear que se perdura invariablemente hasta la fecha.
					
					Lo comprueban evidentemente los hechos de que la Administracion de Obama excluyo en abril de 2010 la RPDC de la lista de los objetos de no uso de armas nucleares y que ahora habla abiertamente del ataque preventivo contra ella realizando en el territorio surcoreano los simulacros militares conjuntos en que se movilizan muchos armamentos de ataque nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. despliega los ejercicios de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC concentrando todos sus medios estrategicos de ataque nuclear en la region de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ningun pais de este planeta habria experimentado en ningun tiempo tal amenaza nuclear seria y real.
					
					Es muy natural la medida de enfrentarse con armas nucleares a EE.UU. que nos amenaza con los artefactos nucleares.
					
					Dado que el imperio norteamericano trato de aplastar con armas nucleares la RPDC, esta se vio obligada a tomar el camino de poseer los armamentos nucleares para defender su soberania y su derecho a existencia de la nacion.
					
					EE.UU. es precisamente el autor que nos empujo a la posesion de las armas nucleares.
					
					Y su incesante amenaza y chantaje nucleares que se perpetran casi cada dia durante varios decenios pasados, es tambien el motivo fundamental que convirtio la RPDC en la poseedora de armas nucleares.
					
					Lograr el equilibrio de la fuerza basado en el fortalecimiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares deviene el unico remedio para hacer frente a la duradera amenaza nuclear y las tentativas de provocacion de guerra de EE.UU., unico pais que uso las armas nucleares y poseedor de maxima cantidad de esos artefactos. 
					
					Contamos con el fuerte poderio militar capaz de responder a cualquier modo de guerra deseado por EE.UU.
					
					Dimos a la publicidad la ojiva nuclear real minimizada y aligerada a ser cargada en el cohete balistico y demostro tambien la capacidad de reentrada en el espacio atmosferico del cohete balistico intercontinental.
					
					Frente a la imprudente hostilidad y abierta amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., intensificaremos mas la capacidad de defensa nacional basada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					La velocidad de desarrollo de nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares dependera de las acciones posteriores de EE.UU. y del cambio de su vista a la RPDC.
					
					Ahora el imperio yanqui libra con frenesi los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 de mayor envergadura en la historia, contra la RPDC en todo el territorio surcoreano pese a nuestras advertencias reiteradas.
					
					Los presentes ejercicios belicos con la movilizacion de cientos mil efectivos y bienes estrategicos nucleares de varios generos, se desarrollan a modo de cumplimiento de guerra real que persigue el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC y hasta la "operacion de decapitacion" apuntando a la Direccion Suprema y el "derrumbe de regimen".
					
					EE.UU. dio a la publicidad que el simulacro es para examinar de manera definitiva la realidad de la guerra anti-RPDC y asi echo siquiera la pancarta enganosa y cinica con la cual lo justificaba hasta ahora como simulacro "anual" y "defensivo".
					
					Puesto que en el presente entrenamiento EE.UU. toma como hecho consumado el ataque preventivo suponiendo el golpe sorpresivo militar de todos tipos contra la RPDC, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta a punto de estallar la guerra ahora mismo.
					
					Es muy evidente que no podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante la amenaza agresiva de EE.UU.
					
					Frente a la locura de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., hemos cambiado el modo de enfrentamiento militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea en el de ataque preventivo y declarado la rotunda voluntad de asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					En una palabra, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en un dilema: la guerra termonuclear o la paz.
					
					En la actualidad, la situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana es extremadamente delicada y todo el mundo incluso Rusia, la observa con gran preocupacion e inquietud.
					
					Para frenar el circulo vicioso de agravacion de tension que se hace mas delicada en la Peninsula Coreana, eliminar la peligrosidad de guerra y garantizar la paz y seguridad, hay que ver no el fenomeno aparecido sino su causa raigal y tomar primero las medidas concernientes para extirparlo.
					
					Todos los paises aspirantes a la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region periferica deberan observar con alta vigilancia las maniobras de EE.UU. que vuelve a la region de Asia-Pacifico el centro estrategico para el dominio mundial y toma la RPDC como primer blanco de ataque, y brindar los merecidos esfuerzos para prevenirlas.

articles.title: Mujeres coreanas manifestaran defenderan a riesgo de vida al Lider, apunta portavoz de UMDC
articles.content:
Mujeres coreanas manifestaran defenderan a riesgo de vida al Lider, apunta portavoz de UMDC
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- Todas las mujeres de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea manifestaran sin reservas el espiritu heroico y temperamento de las coreanas en la batalla decisiva por aniquilar a los agresores imperialistas yanquis, que impusieron de siglo en siglo todas las desgracias y calamidades a la nacion coreana y en estos momentos tambien traen el nubarron de la guerra nuclear sobre el sagrado territorio patrio, y a la traidora surcoreana Park Geun-hye que sigue a ciegas a ellos.
					Asi subrayo la portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en una declaracion fechada 29, y prosiguio:
					
					Todas las mujeres de la RPDC arden de vehemente indignacion y el sentimiento de venganza contra los imperialistas yanquis y la banda de Park Geun-hye que se atreven a atentar a la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion Coreana.
					
					Y esperan solo la orden a la batalla decisiva por la reunificacion de la patria para liberar la parte surcoreana junto con todos los militares y civiles aprendiendo el noble espiritu de defensa a ultranza al Lider de las guerrilleras y las soldadas que defendieron a riesgo de vida la Comandancia de la Revolucion y la Comandancia Suprema en los dias de la lucha armada antijaponesa y la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, respectivamente.
					
					Las mujeres de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea no deben tolerar nunca la locura imprudente de la horda de Park Geun-hye por introducir en el juego de la guerra nuclear a los inocentes habitantes surcoreanos tomandolos como victimas.
					
					Si no desean que sus hijos se metan en el crisol de la guerra nuclear sino aspiran a que ellas mismas y sus familias vivan en paz y felizmente, las mujeres deben levantarse en la lucha por castigar a los maniacos de la guerra nuclear.

articles.title: ACNC critica locura imprudente de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC critica locura imprudente de Japon
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier japones, Abe, persigue el militarismo y nueva agresion.
					Desprecio y critico un "proyecto de ley para abrogacion de la ley de seguridad" recien presentado en comun por los partidos opositores y dijo abiertamente que si se permite este proyecto, seran damnificadas mucho las relaciones de alianza con Estados Unidos.
					
					Esto es la locura muy imprudente del sirviente de guerra que actua con frenesi por realizar la ambicion del militarismo y nueva agresion nadando contra la corriente de la tendencia.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" por su gravedad es objeto de censura antes y despues de la aprobacion.
					
					Varios paises asiaticos y hasta los occidentales expresaron la inquietud y preocupacion por el hecho de que Japon se haya convertido otra vez en el pais capaz de librar la guerra y en el interior de este pais isleno tambien se aumenta la fuerte resistencia.
					
					Por doquier se realizan manifestaciones y mitines, y amplios circulos social y de prensa y hasta el interior del Partido Democratico Liberal en poder alzan las voces en demanda de la cancelacion de susodicha ley.
					
					El recien fundado "encuentro de pleito en demanda de la inconstitucionalidad de la ley de seguridad" expreso la posicion de someter a la consideracion de los tribunales locales del pais la inconstitucionalidad de la ley.
					
					Los partidos opositores de Japon unidos demandaron fuertemente la abrogacion de la dicha ley reflejando la demanda de la opinion publica aspirante a prevenir la guerra y vivir pacificamente.
					
					Pese a tal unanime condenacion y rechazo del interior y exterior del pais, Abe censuro fuertemente las fuerzas anti-guerra abogando por la justicia de la "ley de seguridad" bajo el pretexto del "fortalecimiento de la alianza de Japon y EE.UU.", lo cual demuestra evidentemente a donde llego su ambicion militarista y dominacionista.
					
					Desde el principio, la "ley de seguridad" es un producto del sucio contubernio de EE.UU. y Japon porque el primero quiere materializar la estrategia de dominio sobre Asia y el resto del mundo con las fuerzas al usar el segundo como brigada de choque y el segundo procura realizar su ambicion de agresion a otros paises bajo el amparo del primero.
					
					Ahora Japon militarista intenta preparar las condiciones politico-militares y legales para emprender la agresion a ultramar en cualquier tiempo sin ser restringido por cualquier ley sumandose a EE.UU. que persigue la ambicion de tomar la heguemonia del mundo y, a base de ello, tomar sin vacilacion el camino de reagresion.
					
					Por esta razon, Japon picotea que en virtud de la "ley de seguridad", la alianza Japon-EE.UU. cumplira en el futuro la funcion completa y se mejorara el disuasivo garantizando firmemente la seguridad de Japon.
					
					Las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", que cultivaron su capacidad militar para agredir a ultramar bajo la proteccion y el fomento de EE.UU. durante decenios despues de la derrota en la guerra y hoy se han convertido en las fuerzas armadas agresivas que ocupan el segundo lugar despues de las tropas norteamericanas,  pretenden desarrollar la operacion militar en cualquier lugar del mundo y salir a ultramar en cualquier tiempo bajo el pretexto de apoyar las tropas estadounidenses a traves de la aprobacion de la infame ley de guerra.
					
					Japon todavia no se ha liberado de mala reputacion del pais enemigo sin liquidar el archi-crimen antietico y de guerra aunque transcurrieron 70 anos de su derrota. Tal pais establecio a fuerza la "ley de seguridad" abogando por la "seguridad de Japon" y la "contribucion a la paz y estabilidad internacional" llevando a cuestas a EE.UU., caudillo de agresion.
					
					Esto es el climax del cinismo propio de Japon.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" es el producto indispensable de la extremada politica conservadora del actual gobernador japones que toma el militarismo como ideal politico y filosofia.
					
					Tomando el poder, Abe puso al desnudo su ambicion de ser el "caudillo del Oriente" cantando la cancion "Kimigayo" y dijo abiertamente que la meta de lucha de toda su vida es  precisamente la enmienda de la "Constitucion de Paz".
					
					Se debe a tal politica agresiva de Abe el que promueve a fuerza la ley en cuestion abogando por su justicia en contrapelo de todas las criticas y condenaciones.
					
					Es muy ridicula la conducta grosera de Abe, sirviente de guerra que reprime las voces de protesta de los habitantes japoneses y del mundo entero que demandan fuertemente la abolicion de la ley arriba mencionada, hablando ruidosamente del supuesto "fortalecimiento de la alianza Japon-EE.UU." y la "paz y la seguridad" y siendo brigada de choque en el cumplimento de la guerra agresiva de EE.UU.
					
					Japon acarreo en el pasado las innumerables desgracias y sufrimientos al pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos y ahora pretende tomar otra vez el camino de agresion que amenaza la paz y la seguridad de la humanidad abrigando la ambicion militarista.  Esto es el intolerable crimen de guerra.
					
					La guerra y la paz no pueden coexistir nunca ni las autoridades japonesas pueden justificar con cualquier explicacion su militarismo y politica de guerra.
					
					Las maniobras de Japon por justificar la "ley de seguridad" es el mas atroz acto de guerra que pone en el peligro tanto la paz y seguridad del mundo como el destino de su pais.
					
					El gobernador japones debe actuar con juicio teniendo presente que las imprudentes maniobras tendentes a convertir su pais en el militarista y agredir a ultramar, generaran al fin su autodestruccion.
